OPERATION_FAILED: It's impossible to load more items from server now. Try again later.
CHATTER_MOBILE_ONLY: You need to work on a device to take a photo.
CHATTER_SHARE_SUCCESSFUL: Your data has been successfully shared.
CHATTER_REFRESH_ONLINE_ONLY: You can download all comments from server only when you are online.
SHARE_CHATTER_POSTCARD: Would you like to share your postcard in chatter?
SHARE_CHATTER_BROCHURE: Would you like to share this brochure in chatter?
CONFIRM_DELETE_POSTCARD: Are you sure you would like to delete?
CONFIRM_DELETE_JOURNAL_ENTRY: Are you sure you would like to delete?
POSTCARD_CHATTER_SHARE_OK: Your postcard has been successfully posted to Chatter.
BROCHURE_CHATTER_SHARE_OK: Brochure has been successfully posted to Chatter.
THANKS_WELL_BE_IN_TOUCH: Thanks. We'll be in touch soon.
NOT_TIME_FOR_TRIP: It's not time for your trip yet!
TRY_AGAIN_OR_REPORT: Please try again or contact your administrator.
REPORT_IF_ISSUE_PERSISTS: Contact your administrator if the error persists.
AVATAR_UPLOAD_FAILED_GENERIC_BODY: Avatar updating operation failed. Please try again later.
AVATAR_UPLOAD_FAILED_TOO_BIG_BODY:
Avatar updating operation failed. The provided photo's dimensions are too large.
Please upload a file that is less than 2MBs in size.
FILE_UPLOAD_DISABLED_OFFLINE_BODY: Sorry! Changing your avatar requires you to have a working internet connection.
